text: The 6-month follow-up of #pneumococcal vaccination with #elderly has started. Additionaly our #vaccine study received METC approval to examine #Age related differences in #ImmuneResponse against #Covid19 #vaccination during this follow-up.  @IMI_JU @EU_H2020 @efpia @RIVM #Vital https://t.co/BHlGqCQGqq
